sentences.sContent: The alimentary canal of most animals relies very little on lysosomal enzymes in digesting food.
sentences.sContent_eng: The alimentary canal of most animals relies very little on lysosomal enzymes in digesting food.
sentences.sCn: 大多数动物的消化道在消化食物时，很少有赖于溶酶体的酶。

sentences.sContent: In land animals, saliva contaIns mucus, and provides lubrication for food In the alimentary canal.
sentences.sContent_eng: In land animals, saliva contaIns mucus, and provides lubrication for food In the alimentary canal.
sentences.sCn: 陆上动物的唾液内有粘液，并对消化道内的食物起着润滑作用。

remMethod.val: 和ailment (n. 病) 一起记， 缺乏营养 (alimentary)， 就会得病 (ailment)
